options.title:
'You don't have a campus, you want to drive me crazy,
you don't have a campus' -Aybulu Müge Anlı
options.name: No Campus in Etlik
options.text:
Esenboğa may be a campus, but Etlik is just an apartment and a park. Can't we ask for more?
I don't know, maybe we should be thankful for the park:) ->.
